items.sentence: Tom had been released from the hospital, but he was still recovering from the gunshot wound.
Tom has a brother and a sister. His brother lives in Boston and his sister lives in Chicago.

I met Tom before I graduated from high school, but didn\'t meet Mary until many years later.
